nodes.text: An assassination attempt was undertaken by the Galactic Empire against the terrorist Burnium Ro in 0 BBY. The mission was carried out by Lieutenant Commander Ellian Zahra, who was sent by Grand Moff to eliminate the riotous Ro on the Mid Rim world Ikkrukk, where she destroyed a substantial group of terrorists. Although Zahra believed her mission to be a success, she later found out that Ro himself had never been present, and that the man she believed to be her target was simply a decoy.
